name: PotatoThrower
description:
DESCRIPTION

A first person game where you throw explosive potatoes at enemies to survive. Buy upgrades and remember to replenish your potato count.

CONTROLS

wasd: Standard first person movement.
Escape key: Close the game.
N key: Play next song .
Left mouse click and hold: Increase potato throw power.
Left mouse click release: Throw potato.
Left mouse click (shop): Buy upgrade.
